Plot: A comprehensive look at the Bush Administration's conduct of the Iraq war and its occupation of the country.
Title: No End in Sight
Actors: Campbell Scott, Gerald Burke, Ali Fadhil, Omar Fekeiki
tomatoConsensus: Charles Ferguson's documentary provides a good summary of the decisions that led to the mess in post-war Iraq, and offers politically interested audiences something they'd been looking for: a lowdown on the decision making.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 18 nominations.
